task.title: Import OLE Objects
task.shortdesc: Inserts information of other applications that support OLEobjects.

context.p: ZWCAD provides two ways of inserting OLE objects: embed and link. With the different that a link can be updated whenever you want, embedding is unable to update because of lack of links.
You can use the following method to control the visibility of the inserted OLE objects:
Insert OLEobjects to the drawing on thecurrent layer. Turn off the layer or freeze it to disable displaying OLE objects in the layer.
To embed an object froman existing file within ZWCAD

step.cmd: Choose Insert > OLE Object from the main menu.
In the Insert Object dialog box, click Create From File.
Specify the file by doing one of the following:

substep.cmd: Type a path and file name in the File box.
Click Browse to select a file.

step.cmd: Select Display As Icon if you want that program's icon to appear in the drawing instead of the data.

result.p: To create a new embedded object within ZWCAD

ol.li: Choose Insert > OLE Object from the main menu.
In the Insert Object dialog box, click Create New.

From the Object Type list, select the type of object youwant to create, and then click
OK.
The program for creating that object opens within ZWCAD.
Create the object in the other program.
Choose File > Exit to close the program.
